page.title: 12Shopping in the Southam Area
page.content: Most needs and services are catered for in the Southam area. Shops range from small village stores to large supermarkets ( a new supermarket is under construction at the moment). In spite of the fact that so much is available in Southam itself, most families enjoy a shopping trip to Leamington Spa, Coventry, Rugby or Banbury once a week, combining shopping with an enjoyable outing. There is a small open air{market}on Tuesdays with a free bus service to bring in people from surrounding villages. Here all sorts of goods are for sale often at bargain prices. Most Southam shops close on Wednesday afternoon. In the summer months when the soft fruit is available, many people go to nearby Stockton to pick their own fruit at the farms there.
